text:
Questions to get some ideas flowing:
What is the most commonly accessed information for you in the developer info? Is there any type of information that you wish you had quick access to when debugging a HS page?
I was thinking yesterday it would be cool if there was something like how semrush reports issues on a site in HubSpot
I know they have the page recommendations but I feel like there should be more detailed info
do you have an example screenshot or types of info or anything? I don’t use SEMRush so I don’t really know what they provide
Yea I'll do a quick report on HubSpots site to get you an example

I'm not sure this is in SEMRush... or where this lives... but I've always thought it would be sweet to know ALL url's currently 404'ing.

When you push a new site live, there are inevitably some things that fall through the cracks. Knowing what URLs didn't get mapped properly / updated would be uber helpful to 301 those and save the link before google deindexs.

Joomla has an extension (SH404sef) that does that and it was SOOOOOOO helpful.

:point_up_2:
This all might be a SEO tool vs. Developer tool... so maybe not relevant... but it's the first thing that comes to mind. :slightly_smiling_face:
It’s still valid. I’ll keep it in my brain and think on it
Yup SEMRush has all these things listed out. I'll DM you real quick.
We just hit 1100 active users! (We're actually at 1121 but we shot up before i noticed 1100)
